page.title: 17BROADFORD HOTEL page1
page.content: {The Broadford Hotel}takes up two acres including gardens.It has 32 rooms capable of accommodating 50 guests.As many as 5500 people stay in the hotel each year. The hotel employs 20 staff.They try to employ local staff as far as possible but most of the staff come from outside Skye.This season has been particularly busy.Professor Ian Grimble the historian, and pop singer John Martyn both stayed at the hotel this year.Bed & Breakfast costs Â£22.50.Fishing in the Broadford River for salmon and sea-trout is available free of charge to residents.Most of the visitors to the hotel stay for two or three nights.80% of the rooms have private bathrooms.The hotel has 13 staff rooms-9 for females and 4 for males. {Continued on page 18........ {
